PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2004-09182004-08-26,  ,  ,  ,  ,  HERITAGE
ActCanadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission Act
PrecisReappointment of P. ANDRÉE WYLIE of Ottawa, Ontario, to be a full-time member of the Canadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission to hold office during good behaviour for a term of one year; and designation of P. ANDRÉE WYLIE to be Vice-Chairperson of the Canadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission; effective August 31, 2004.
AttachmentsAttachment
